name: package-docs
description: Documentation of all my created packages

scripts.change-major: pnpm version major -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-minor: pnpm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: pnpm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.format: pnpm run format-prettier && pnpm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: pnpm run format-prettier-typescript && pnpm run format-prettier-javascript
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tsc && pnpm run lint-eslint && pnpm run lint-file-dependencies && pnpm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: pnpm run lint-prettier-typescript && pnpm run lint-prettier-javascript
scripts.use-local-components: pnpm --prefix ../components run create-local-package && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/components && pnpm install ../components/alextheman-components-*.tgz
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: pnpm --prefix ../eslint-plugin run create-local-package && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && pnpm install --save-dev ../eslint-plugin/alextheman-eslint-plugin-*.tgz
